Title: BL-5 FROSTBITE

mission_effects.gunner_penalty: Frostbitten gunners can only hit attacking fighters by rolling a 6, regardless of attack position
mission_effects.duration: Remains frostbitten for rest of mission

post_mission_recovery.description: After landing, roll 1D for each frostbitten crewman separately

recovery_table.1-3: Crewman may not fly any more missions
recovery_table.4-6: Crewman recovers, may fly next mission

frostbite_effects.wound_interaction: Any frostbitten crew member who is also seriously wounded adds 1 to his serious wound survival die roll

notes: a) See rules section Heat Out/Frostbite.
b) After landing, roll 1D for each frostbitten crewman separately: 1-3 = crewman may not fly any more missions; 4-6 = crewman recovers, may fly next mission.
Once a crew member is frostbitten, he remains so for the rest of the mission.
Frostbitten gunners can only hit attacking fighters by rolling a 6, regardless of the position of their attack.
Any frostbitten crew member who is also seriously wounded adds 1 to his serious wound survival die roll.
